mvalue.billboardrotation.adjust_to_playe: Whether the entity should adjust to the player's rotation
mvalue.billboardrotation.animation_delay: The delay between each animation frame
mvalue.billboardrotation.body_rotation_i: The interval at which the entity bodies should rotate
mvalue.billboardrotation.head_rotation_i: The interval at which the entity heads should rotate
mvalue.billboardrotation.rotate_vertical: Whether the entity should rotate vertically
